## `gdocker clean`

Remove Docker images created by `gdocker`.

To see help and available options for this command:

```{bash}
gdocker help clean
```

Example: See the commands to remove all images matching `ubuntu_a:*` in the `docker_images` directory:

```{bash}
gdocker clean -n ubuntu_a:*
```
